de.polygonal.ds.BitFlags

type
class

Small helper class for working with bit flags.

Static Methods

inline clrf(x : BitField, mask : Int) : Void

x = x AND ~mask.

inline getf(x : BitField, mask : Int) : Int

Returns x OR mask.

inline hasf(x : BitField, mask : Int) : Bool

Returns x AND mask != 0

inline incf(x : BitField, mask : Int) : Bool

Returns x AND mask == mask (x includes all mask bits).

inline invf(x : BitField, mask : Int) : Void

x = x ^ mask.

inline nulf(x : BitField) : Void

x = 0.

inline setf(x : BitField, mask : Int) : Void

x = x | mask.

inline setiff(x : BitField, bits : Int, expr : Bool) : Void

Calls setf(x, bits) if expr is true or clrf(x, bits) if expr is false.

inline swpf(x : BitField, i : Int, j : Int) : Void

parameters
x the bits that are modified.
Swaps the bit at index i with the bit at index j (LSB 0).
